content: hey, let’s take a #leaptogether! Taking a risk is tough, especially alone. So starting February 29th, WELD wants you to share your leap with the world. Share a simple jumping photo or a story about a leap you’ve taken in your life, anything goes! Enter to win: 1. Follow WELD on Instagram > 2. Share your post tagged #leaptogether (it can be anything!) 3. Tag a friend in the comments below Win a Moment iPhone Lens Kit Three of the world’s best iPhone lenses ($455) Wide, Tele, Macro, Holsters, Cleaning Pen & Carrying Case read more: momentlens.co Win a Kammok Roo Adventure anywhere in our favorite camping hammock for two ($129) Kammok Roo Camping Hammock w/ Python Strapsread more: kammok.com We can’t wait to see the leaps you take together :-) — WELD P.S. There’s a secret bonus prize for the most creative submission! :-) Details: Winners will be selected at random and announced Friday, March 4th. All mediums accepted. Better your chances by tagging more of your friends in the comments. Post as many images as you like for additional entries.
